## Voice.on() method

Audio devices updated event. Raised when the list of audio devices changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(audioDevicesUpdatedEvent: Voice.Event.AudioDevicesUpdated, listener: Voice.Listener.AudioDevicesUpdated): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  audioDevicesUpdatedEvent | [Voice.Event.AudioDevicesUpdated](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Voice.Listener.AudioDevicesUpdated](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.audiodevicesupdated_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The call object.
